entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Peek definition doesn't work on source-generated methods #73970
  • EnforceCodeStyleInBuild reports suggestions as errors in 8.0.300 #73974
    17.12
  • CS8795 reported when expression with reference to another assembly happen #73964
  • VB.NET SemanticModel doesn't resolve type of a member even though it could #73961
    Backlog
  • PostProcessChangesAsync(Document, CancellationToken) is not called anymore #73957
  • Test performance regression between 4.8 and 4.9.2, still there in 4.10 #73956
  • Breakpoints incorrectly added after hot reload #73955

Closed

  • Edit.Duplicate command does not insert trailing newline between original and duplicated code #73891
  • Visual Studio won't show errors and Error list doesn't switch to code line after doubl click #73863
  • Hints for reinstalling Nuget disappeared #73936
    Backlog
  • Warning AD0001 : Analyzer '' threw an exception of type 'System.NullReferenceException' with message 'Object reference not set to an instance of an object.'. #72046
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35011.102 #73960
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35011.277 #73959
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35012.02 #73958

PullRequests

Created

  • Move builds to 1ES PT #73973
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add generated semantic search API list #73966
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.10 #73954
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Report diagnostic for `field` in property accessors regardless of language version #73952
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove option controlling which persistence DB to use. #73969
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.8 #73953
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Remove A/B option for enabling features in SG docs. #73968
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move VSExtensibility back to the nuget.org version #73972
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add another TS extension path #73971
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Microsoft.Identity.Client and System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt to InternalTools.props #73967
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Expose Roslyn LSP types to XAML and add readme #73942
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove A/B option to disable recoverable texts #73965
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add documentation to Values property in TypedConstant struct #73912
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unused scripts #73963
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #73932
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use a serialization compatible marker #73851
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens to InternalTools.props and add restore source #73950
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update required VS to 17.8. #73951
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.8 #73929
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Add Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens to InternalTools.props #73948
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Parse `field` and `value` as contextual keywords #73947
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use correct get / set inside ref safety analysis #73842
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Smart Rename: Provide additional context for renamed symbol #73873
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Improve parser recovery around nullable types in patterns #72805
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • ChildSyntaxList.ItemInternal optimization #73650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add standard implicit array-to-Span conversions #73577
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Search less projects when looking for linked documents #73939
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure that when EnC finishes that it disposes the OOP connection it is holding onto #73465
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Rename SG run mode from Balanced to Manual #73784
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Include wrapping options in editorconfig formatting options #73938
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add a delay for SmartRename if user begins to type #73949
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Upgrade MicrosoftCodeAnalysisTestingVersion to 1.1.2-beta1.24121.1 #73840
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Doc Cookbook Auto Interface Implementation #73906
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Check duplicate interfaces only for metadata #73797
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2470703 #73415
    auto-merge
